title: FABULI 3 Level T-House. RICH/REFIN Hwds, 1.5 Baths, AIR
neighborhood: Belmont loc tight to Cambridge line, walk to Alewife
posting_body: ['A No real estate fee prop.', 'Modest 2 months in all, at approval, to secure it.', 'Very PICTURESQUE AREA OFFERS 3-LEVEL TOWNHOUSE WITH RICH/REFINISHED HARDWOOD FLOORING, tons of sun, new appliances, cement patio.', '6 rooms/2+ beds + 1 and a 1/2 baths.', ' CENTRAL AIR.', 'Open floor plan leads to newer kitchen with: refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, disposal; appli-s all either new or newer, also find euro-tile work, plenty of cabinet space, et al.', 'Elongated bedrooms with double closets.', 'Very scenic background extends from balcony.', 'Baths are tiled over, living room is 16 feet deep, basement is 20+ feet deep and sports extra storage if necessary.', 'Same is unheated though private, immaculate and deep/open lower level (great as a rec area--ie, pool table or otherwise), as your 3rd floor.', 'Also provides separate area with laundry access, direct sliders to outside for the bikes, et al. 2 driveway parking spaces.', 'Snow removal even covered.', 'In other words-hurry!', 'Meticulously kept, fresh all around space.', 'Ready date for August 15 to September 1 latest.', 'NO PETS  please, no exceptions.', 'Challenges comparison at every turn.', 'Virtual tours also provided for.', 'Call John Lambergs1, Ingram Realty']
